subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Komives, a sharpshooting guard who played for 10 years in the N.B.A., was perhaps best remembered for the trade that sent him to the Detroit Pistons for the future Hall of Famer Dave DeBusschere.
snippet: Mr. Komives, a sharpshooting guard who played for 10 years in the N.B.A., was perhaps best remembered for the trade that sent him to the Detroit Pistons for the future Hall of Famer Dave DeBusschere.
